Package controller

Class Appointments

java.lang.Object
controller.Appointments
public class Appointments extends Object
The Appointments controller class for the Appointments view. Facilitates processing of Appointment data, including insertion, updating, and deletion, through interactions with AppointmentDAO.

  • Constructor Details

    • Appointments

      public Appointments()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes UI components and populates the TableView.

    • setupEventListeners

      private void setupEventListeners()
      Sets up listeners for date, contact, and start time fields. The listeners assist with populating data into start and end time combo boxes.

      LAMBDA: The lambdas here were just used to reduce boilerplate code and the need for explicit interface implementation. In return, this yields a marginal but meaningful improvement to readability.

    • toggleUIState

      private void toggleUIState()
      Toggles the UI state between default, new appointment, and edit appointment modes. Enables or disables form fields and buttons based on the current mode.

    • resetAppointmentFields

      private void resetAppointmentFields()
      Resets all form fields to their initial, empty state.

    • refreshTableView

      private void refreshTableView()
      Refreshes the TableView with the list of appointments. Converts the stored UTC time to the user's local time zone before displaying.

    • populateStartTimeComboBox

      private void populateStartTimeComboBox(LocalDate selectedDate)
      Fills the start time combo box with a range of appointment start times based on business operating hours, in the user's local time. This avoids the issue of scheduling appointments outside operating hours.
      Parameters:
      selectedDate - The selected date for the appointment.

    • populateEndTimeComboBox

      private void populateEndTimeComboBox(LocalTime startTime, LocalDate selectedDate)
      Populates the end time combo box based on the selected start time and selected date.
      Parameters:
      startTime - The selected start time for the appointment.

    • populateContactComboBox

      private void populateContactComboBox()
      Populates the Contact Name combo box with the names of available contacts.

    • onAllAppointmentsRadioButtonClick

      public void onAllAppointmentsRadioButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the "All Appointments" radio button. Deselects other related radio buttons and refreshes the TableView to show all appointments.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the All Appointments radio button.

    • onCurrentMonthAppointmentsRadioButtonClick

      public void onCurrentMonthAppointmentsRadioButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the "Current Month" radio button. Deselects other related radio buttons and refreshes the TableView to show appointments for the current month.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Month radio button.

    • onCurrentWeekAppointmentsRadioButtonClick

      public void onCurrentWeekAppointmentsRadioButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the "Current Week" radio button. Deselects other related radio buttons and refreshes the TableView to show appointments for the current week.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Current Week radio button.

    • onDeleteAppointmentButtonClick

      public void onDeleteAppointmentButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the Delete Appointment Button. If an appointment is selected, it shows a confirmation dialog before proceeding to delete the appointment. If no appointment is selected, an error alert is shown. The UI is updated upon successful deletion.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Delete Appointment button.

    • onEditAppointmentButtonClick

      public void onEditAppointmentButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the Edit Appointment button. Toggles the UI state between editing an existing appointment and the default state. If an appointment is selected, it populates the UI fields with the selected appointment's details. If no appointment is selected, an error alert is shown.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Edit Appointment button.

    • onNewAppointmentButtonClick

      public void onNewAppointmentButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to click event for New Appointment button. Toggles the UI state between creating a new appointment and the default state. Calls a method to update the UI elements based on the new state.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the New Appointment button.

    • onSaveAppointmentButtonClick

      public void onSaveAppointmentButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Responds to the click event for the Save Appointment Button. Calls method for validation check to alert user of any empty fields. Checks the current UI state to determine if the user is creating a new appointment or editing an existing one. Checks for scheduling conflicts before creating or updating an appointment.

      LAMBDA: The lambda used here is used when in the edit state, to filter out the currently selected appointment from the list of conflicts, so that it can be saved without issue.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Save Appointment button.

    • hasAppointmentConflicts

      private boolean hasAppointmentConflicts(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, boolean isNewAppointment)
      Used to check for scheduling conflicts before creating or updating an appointment. In the case of editing an existing appointment, it excludes the appointment being edited from the conflict check.
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - The desired start datetime for the appointment.
      endDateTime - The desired end datetime for the appointment.
      isNewAppointment - Flag to indicate if the operation is for creating a new appointment (true) or editing an existing one (false).
      Returns:
      true if a scheduling conflict exists (ex: if there is an overlapping appointment), false otherwise.

    • onCustomerTabButtonClick

      public void onCustomerTabButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Switches the current scene to the Customer Management view when the Customer navigation tab is clicked.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Customer Navigation Tab.

    • onReportsTabButtonClick

      public void onReportsTabButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Switches the current scene to the Reports view when the Reports navigation tab is clicked.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the Reports Navigation Tab.

    • onLogoutButtonClick

      public void onLogoutButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Switches the current scene to the User Login view when the Logout button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - A click event on the logout button.

    • getUserNameFromUserIdField

      private String getUserNameFromUserIdField()
      Gets the username corresponding to the user ID specified in the appointment form.
      Returns:
      The username associated with the user ID in the form.

    • getContactIdFromComboBox

      private int getContactIdFromComboBox()
      Gets the ID of the contact selected in the Contact Name combo box.
      Returns:
      The ID corresponding to the selected contact name.

    • convertToUTC

      private LocalDateTime convertToUTC(LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Converts a given LocalDateTime to its UTC equivalent.
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - The local date-time to convert.
      Returns:
      The UTC equivalent of the given local datetime.

    • convertFromUTC

      private LocalDateTime convertFromUTC(LocalDateTime utcDateTime)
      Converts a given UTC LocalDateTime to its local time equivalent.
      Parameters:
      utcDateTime - The UTC date-time to convert.
      Returns:
      The local time equivalent of the given UTC datetime.

    • updateExistingAppointment

      private void updateExistingAppointment(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      Updates an existing appointment record. Gets the appointment from the table, updates the data with the form field values, and applies these changes to the database using DAO methods. Refreshes the UI and displays a message indicating whether the update was successful or failed, with an added alert dialog on failure.
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - The new local start time for the appointment.
      endDateTime - The new local end time for the appointment.

    • createNewAppointment

      private void createNewAppointment(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      Gets data from the form fields and creates a new appointment object. The new appointment object is used in conjunction with DAO methods to insert a new appointment into the database. Upon success, the UI is refreshed to show the updated list of appointments. If insertion fails, an alert and UI message is displayed.
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - The local start time of the appointment.
      endDateTime - The local end time of the appointment.

    • checkForEmptyFields

      private void checkForEmptyFields()
      Performs a validation check to ensure that all fields have been filled out in the appointment form. If any fields are empty, an alert dialog is shown and the user is asked to complete the form before trying again.

    • canPopulateStartTimes

      private boolean canPopulateStartTimes()
      Performs a check to make sure that date fields are set before start times are populated.
      Returns:
      true if values have been selected for start date and end date, otherwise false.

    • setupAppointmentsTableView

      private void setupAppointmentsTableView()
      Initializes the appointments table view with column mappings and loads appointments from the database.

    • showOverlappingAppointmentAlert

      private void showOverlappingAppointmentAlert()
      To alert the user that there is an appointment conflict due to an overlap of appointment times.

    • validateAppointmentTimes

      private boolean validateAppointmentTimes()
      Validation check to make sure an appointment's end date/time is after the start date/time. Helpful particularly for the UTC+00:00 timezone, where the local conversion of business operating hours is 1300-0300.
      Returns:
      true if end date/time is after start date/time, false otherwise
